## RouteMethod type

The set of common HTTP methods supported by OpenSearch Dashboards routing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RouteMethod = SafeRouteMethod | DestructiveRouteMethod;
```
<b>References:</b> [SafeRouteMethod](./opensearch-dashboards.saferoutemethod.md)<!-- -->, [DestructiveRouteMethod](./opensearch-dashboards.destructiveroutemethod.md)
